article.title: Poker player and admin functions
article.label: Functionality
article.intro: Read more on the functionality of player and administrator
article.description: GS-Poker online poker server software enables Texas Holdem, Omaha, and 7-Card Stud games for your poker players.
article.keywords: poker software, online poker business, online poker server software, poker software for sale, online poker system

text.p: High-level list of functions for GS-Poker players:

ul.li: Register account (with email, login, password and personal information)
View Lobby and select type of game, view active players, view stakes, average pots
"Go" to the table and see the game
"Sit" at the table and play with up to 9 opponents (10 places per table)
Play for money and play for fun (different tables)
Texas Holdem, Texas Holdem No Limit
Online chat between players and online virtual bar
Play at more than one table at the same time

text.p: Functions for the administrator (available via web admin panel):

ul.li: View, delete, block, create players, and restrict player rights
Add money to player accounts, and view finance reports
View game statistics, reports, and view history of past games
Bonus management (bonus for first deposit, for highest card of the day, etc.)

text.p: You'll save time with one year of free updates of the software, which we issue on a regular basis.
